manifest_description.message: A browser extension that detects shadowbans on Twitter.

accountShadowbannedMessage.message: This user may be shadowbanned, so this tweet may not appear in search results.

accountSuggestBannedMessage.message: This user may be suggest-banned, so this account may not apper in search suggestions.

accountAndTweetShadowbannedMessage.message: This tweet is age-restricted and cannot be viewed by users under the age of 18 or who are not logged in. This tweet may not appear in search results.

tweetFlaggedAsSensitiveMessage.message: This tweet is flagged as sensitive and will not appear in search results depending on the viewer's preferences.

tweetShadowbannedMessage.message: This tweet is age-restricted and cannot be viewed by users under the age of 18 or who are not logged in. This tweet may not appear in search results.

tweetNoProblemMessage.message: No problems was found with this tweet.

accountHasNoSensitiveFlag.message: âœ…Tweet is not flagged as sensitive.

tweetsPossiblyInSearchResults.message: âœ…Tweet may appear in search results.

tweetsPossiblyNotInSearchResults.message: ðŸš«Tweet may not appear in search results.

settingsShowMessageInAllTweets.message: Show check results in all tweets

settingsEnableOnlyForCurrentUsersTweets.message: Display check results only in your own tweets (beta)

settingsPleaseReload.message: Please reload Twitter once you have changed the settings.
